TrbNetEntity.name: TDC
TrbNetEntity.description: An FPGA-based tapped-delay line time-to-digital converter (TDC)

register.name: Channel
register.description: Channel-specific information

field.name: HitCounter
field.description: Number of detected hits in channel

register.name: BasicStatus
register.description: Basic config and status information for all channels

field.name: ReadoutFSM
field.description: Debug word of the TDC readout FSM

field.name: WriteoutFSM
field.description: Debug word of the TDC writeout FSM

field.name: RefTimeSyncedTo100
field.description: Reference time synchronised to 100 MHz Trb-Net clock

memory.name: EmptyChannels
memory.description: Empty the signals/hits of the specific channel. LSB is channel 1.

register.name: TriggerWindowStatus
register.description: Status of the TriggerWindow feature

field.name: TriggerWindowBeforeValue
field.description: Trigger window width BEFORE the trigger with granularity of 5 ns

field.name: TriggerWindowAfterValue
field.description: Trigger window width AFTER the trigger with granularity of 5 ns

register.name: TriggerCounter
register.description: Number of valid triggers received

register.name: TimingTriggerCounter
register.description: Number of valid timing triggers received

register.name: NoTimingTriggerCounter
register.description: Number of valid triggers received which are not timing triggers

register.name: InvalidTriggerCounter
register.description: Number of invalid triggers received

register.name: MultiTimingTriggerCounter
register.description: Number of multi timing triggers received (triggers received before trigger is released)

register.name: SpuriousTriggerCounter
register.description: Number of spurious triggers received (in case of timing trigger is validated although it was a timing-trigger-less trigger)

register.name: WrongReadoutsCounter
register.description: Number of wrong readouts due to spurious triggers

register.name: SpikesCounter
register.description: Number of spikes (pulses narrower than 40 ns) detected at the timing trigger input

register.name: IdleTime
register.description: Total time length, that the readout FSM waited in the idle state (with granularity of 10 ns)

register.name: WaitTime
register.description: Total time length, that the readout FSM waited in the wait states (with granularity of 10 ns)

register.name: TotalEmptyChannelsCounter
register.description: Total number of empty channels since the last reset signal

register.name: ReleaseCounter
register.description: Number of release signals sent

register.name: ReadoutTime
register.description: Total time length of the readout process (with granularity of 10 ns)

register.name: TimeoutCounter
register.description: Number of timeouts detected (too long delay after the timing trigger)

register.name: FinishedCounter
register.description: Number of sent finished signals

register.name: BasicControl
register.description: Basic control for all channels

field.name: DebugOutput
field.description: Enables different signals to the HPLA* output for debugging with logic analyser

field.name: DebugMode
field.description: Enables the Debug Mode. Different statistics and debug words are sent after every trigger

field.name: TriggerMode
field.description: Select the trigger mode: With trigger mode or trigger-less mode

register.name: TriggerWindowConfig
register.description: Configuration of the TriggerWindow feature

field.name: TriggerWindowBefore
field.description: Trigger window width BEFORE the trigger with granularity of 5 ns

field.name: TriggerWindowAfter
field.description: Trigger window width AFTER the trigger with granularity of 5 ns. ATTENTION: Minimum value is x"00f"!

memory.name: ChannelEnable
memory.description: Enable signals/hits of the specific channel. LSB is channel 1.

register.name: DataTransferLimit
register.description: Configuration of the data transfer limit feature

field.name: MaxWords
field.description: Defines number of data words per channel to be read-out. Set it to 0x80 for full readout.
